Name: Book of Yog Idle RPG
About the game: *** For information about current state of the Early Access version, please refer to 'From Game Developers' section in this page. *** Recruit heroes, build a team, and explore an idle RPG with a depth strategy system! Become the commander of “The blade of pioneers”, recruit the unique heroes of “Black Guard”, slay the vicious monsters from 'Black Tide', defense the St.Nigar Great Wall, which is in precarious situation, explore the truth behind the surging undercurrent. Experience an interesting and relax idle RPG, there are various of heroes, skill books, gears and loots are waiting for you to capture, and you can build the strongest team with most powerful heroes. Main feature Idle system Experience an easier idle RPG! You can gain materials even off-line, and don't need to waste time in meaningless battle. Facilitate the growth of your team, to enjoy the game quickly! Heroes More than 30 heroes are waiting for you to recruit, and more heroes are waiting to join the game. There are 6 unique class waiting for you to select: Warrior, Tank, Archer, Assassin, Mage, Support. Each class has its own unique and special growth system and talents tree. As an RPG enthusiast, you mustn't miss it! Strategy System Experience the rich game strategy system, select both of the items, skills, talents, characters freely to make a perfect combination. Create your own unique hero! Skill Combination Each hero has unique skill trees and talents, collect special skill books to customize your heroes' skill system. Fell freely to collect, learn and combine. And create a most fun and powerful hero to improve the combat strategy and the fun of the game! Team Formation Assemble a team with 6 'Black Guards' to fight for you. With the various team formation which can activate different effects, you can create a unique and powerful team freely. As long as you deploy the best heroes and classes in your team, even the team is consists of only 6 guards or 6 supports, it can also be victory in every battle! Random System Explore the wildness, battlefields, and dungeons, and slay the monsters to get thousands of unique loots, all of which are randomly generated. Every battle is an unexpected gain and experience! Loot System Experience an easy and fun loot system, no need to invest too much effort, and no need to P2W. Whether gears, props, loots, or even heroes can be gain easily. Sand-box System You can DIY your own camp with the sand-box construct system, enjoy a fun and relax game experience! (Under development, not released yet) And more game contents will be published with our continuously update, please stay tuned!
